review_blob: I havent had a Dels in about 15 years but this beer took me back in time. Had a nice bitterness to it that balanced any sweetness from the flavoring added. Not the typical "Shandy" flavor...but thats not a bad thing.

All in all it was an enjoyable beer. Aroma is much sweeter than the flavor profile. Light in color with a straw hue. Wonderful white flavors quickly followed by the bitterness of the IPA hop character.
